casebody.data:
Monday, January 10, 2000

MOTION DOCKET

96-2819. State v. Hessler.

Franklin C.P. No. 95CP116906. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to continue oral argument currently scheduled for January 11, 2000,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to continue oral argument be, and hereby is, granted.
